patterns_discovered: Task completion follows a status progression pattern: 'pending' -> 'completed'
Implementation plans use structured task tracking with unique IDs
Configuration validation tasks are organized in numbered subtasks
Timestamps are updated upon task completion
gotchas_discovered: Implementation plan status updates require precise field targeting
Task completion involves both status and timestamp updates
Configuration validation tasks follow a sequential numbering pattern

approach_outcome.strategy: Incremental task completion with status tracking
approach_outcome.effectiveness: Successfully marked agent reference validation tests as completed
approach_outcome.efficiency: Single file update achieved task completion
approach_outcome.scope: Focused on marking a specific subtask as completed

recommendations: Maintain consistent task numbering patterns for better organization
Use timestamp updates to track progress accurately
Consider adding completion notes or metadata for completed tasks
